column4: Needing help with compiling support for my modem in the kernel.  Anyone willing to help?
is it a module you need to download 3rd party source from to compile against the kernel source?
the kernel source in ubuntu is the package named linux-source, install that, and then when your 3rd party driver asks where the kernel source is, point it to whereever linux-source goes
thanks.  I'll give it a shot.
